      • binary

        public static java.lang.String binary​(int value,
                                      int bits)
        Returns:
        The lowest bits of the given value as a binary string

      • debug

        public static java.lang.String debug​(java.lang.Object object)
        Converts the given object to a debug string. If the object supports the AsString interface, the AsString.asString(StringFormat) method is called with StringFormat.DEBUGGER. If it does not, the toString() method is called.
        Parameters:
        object - The object
        Returns:
        A debug string for the object

      • display

        public static java.lang.String display​(java.lang.Enum<?> enumValue)
        Returns:
        The given enum value as a displayable string

      • html

        public static java.lang.String html​(java.lang.String text)
        Returns:
        The given text trivially converted to HTML

      • nonNullString

        public static java.lang.String nonNullString​(java.lang.Object value)
        Returns:
        The value as a string or an empty string if it is null

      • string

        public static java.lang.String string​(java.lang.Object object,
                                      java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Returns:
        The given object as a string or the given value if it is null

      • string

        public static java.lang.String string​(java.lang.Object object)
        Returns:
        The given object as a string or "null" if it is null
